name: Spaceship Janitor
description:
You were assigned to maintain a broken spaceship on its way to a repair station, but it seems that you're not alone on the ship, and you only have a can of spray and a lighter to defend yourself from the aliens.

Gameplay:

  • The ship is very old, so you will have to fix the constantly breaking wiring to prevent the ship from exploding - after a wire is broken, you have 20 seconds to fix it before it starts doing permanent damage to the ship. To fix wires, just stand near them
  • There are hostile aliens on the spaceship - kill them with fire! Shake the spray can to build up pressure, which is needed to shoot a flame

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - movement
  • Space - opening doors
  • LMB - spray
  • RMB - shake the can
  • Tab - open map
  • Comma/Period - change volume

Download the standalone version for a better experience - it has a leaderboard and much better audio

Made in about 6 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Sound effects from fesliyanstudios.com and zapsplat.com
